name: Rhythm Nightmares
description:
Have you ever tossed and turned at night? Kept up by thoughts that just won't let you rest? Fight off these intrusive thoughts with music as they take demonic forms in Rhythm Nightmares.  Use the power of music to parry enemy attacks leaving them open to strike down. Each sleep demon represents a different genre of music that blends together to create a truly eye-opening symphony. Stave off the nightmares and the worse thoughts in this exploration of what keeps us up at night. 

Sweet dreams <3

Controls: 

Red Nodes: Left Mouse Click 

Blue Nodes: Space Bar
